channel.title: OMFG... Why... Won't... It... Let... Other...People... On... My... Server
channel.description:
OK... I can't get my server to allow other people onto it... It just won't let them... It says "error connecting to server... Must be down" for ALL OF the players who attempt to join it... I called a friend and had him try it and he says it still says "error connecting to server"... What the HELL do I have to do to get it online?!?
I have a PimpScape source... If that makes a difference...
Would like a response fast... Thanks...

item.title: OMFG... Why... Won't... It... Let... Other...People... On... My... Server
item.dc:creator: @Odimaru Odimaru
item.description:
@Odimaru wrote:

Got enough questions in the same sentence? :eek:

lmao, did you run it?
1. Yes, I did, numerous times...
What are you running it through?
2. What the hell do you mean what am I running it through?
you MUST go into your router and portforward it...
3. How do you port forward & what if I don't have a router? 4. I have a no-ip -- at least, I can connect to it, but no one else can.. Always gives an error when trying to connect to my server...[br][size=1]Posted on: April 01, 2007, 09:46:24 PM[/size][hr]

EDIT: Get on AIM, we can talk easier there.

Read full topic
